Articles.Content:
So, procedural fairings only has the 1.25m base and ring, however, I have unlocked all the nodes in the trees that involve these, and purchased them respectively. However, the larger bases/rings are not in the VAB parts list. Any assistance please? It seems like all of my mods go bad.

- - - Updated - - -

Never mind, as soon as I posted this, I figured it out xD
